linear.value:
[[$introtextDescription? &introtext=`

We have this interesting problem with black holes. What is a black hole?

It is a region of space where you have mass that's confined to zero volume, which means that the density is infinitely large, which means we have no way of describing, really, what a black hole is!

` ]]

[[$introtextSingleParagraph? &introtext=`

I'm reading a book about anti-gravity.

It's impossible to put down.

` ]]

[[$richTextSegment? &content=`

Joshua Foer once said: the fact that books today are mostly a string of words makes it easier to forget the text. With the impact of the iPad and the future of the book being up for re-imagination, I wonder whether we'll rediscover the importance of making texts richer visually.

` &segment_type=`raised` &padding=`relaxed` &alignment=`justified` ]]

[[$quoteBasic?
    &quote=`A physicist is just an atom's way of looking at itself.`
    &cite=`Niels Bohr`
]]

main.value: Oh and if you enjoyed listening to Richard Feynman, you will love The pleasure of finding things out.
